channel.title: Netlify on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Netlify on My New Hugo Site

item.title: 解决 Netlify 部署 Hugo 静态博客时的 `fatal: remote error: upload-pack: not our ref` 问题
item.description: 问题描述 我的其中一个 Hugo 博客采用了 PaperMod 主题，另一个是 hugo-coder 主题，都是通过 Netlify 部署，昨天晚上发现，Netlify 显示 paper.191000.xyz 对应的站点部署失败。 问题日志显示： 12:26:05 PM: Waiting for other deploys from your team to complete. Check the queue: https://app.netlify.com/teams/zwyyy456/builds 12:26:20 PM: build-image version: 3ffff9df3d5419545acc1b673a54de348174406d (focal) 12:26:20 PM: buildbot version: 4613af4169363e3b38cfadfa4665d34cd1d1427b 12:26:20 PM: Fetching cached dependencies 12:26:20 PM: Starting to download cache of 106.8MB 12:26:22 PM: Finished downloading cache in 1.935s 12:26:22 PM: Starting to extract cache 12:26:23 PM: Finished extracting cache in 720ms 12:26:23 PM: Finished fetching cache in 2.
